mdRecord.dcterms:title: Saddlebag
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Doctor's saddlebag with top and side compartments containing glass medicine bottles. Includes: oxalate of cerium (ceriioxalas), antifebrin, kino, Ingluvin, Hyd. C. Creta, Santonine, Creta Praep, Belladonna, [Hydro]Chlorate of Cocaine, FR Digitalis, Flu Ext. Aconite, Pulv. Ipecac, morph. sulph, Hyd. Chlo. Mit, Quinine capsules, chloroform, pulv. opil, podophylin.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--Bags
